short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bot Bumper is an arcade action game where you’ll take on the role of a feisty minibot in a futuristic arena teeming with rival

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bot Bumper is an arcade action game where you’ll take on the role of a feisty minibot in a futuristic arena teeming with rival minibots. In this adrenaline-fueled arcade action game, your objective is clear: outmaneuver, outwit, and outlast your opponents by strategically pushing them out of the arena or annihilating them with calculated collisions. Are you ready to prove your dominance in the arena? Strap in, rev your engines, and get ready to bump your way to victory in Bot Bumper!

Platforms
Web browser (desktop and mobile)
Android
Last Updated
Apr 09, 2024

Controls
Drag left mouse button, WASD, or arrow keys = move
L = unlock mouse
R = restart
Space = jump (football arena mode)
